transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Hello, ha ji boliye.
Executive: Boliye sir. Good morning sir. Kaise ho? Good morning, good morning.
Executive: Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hun India Mart se sir.
Customer: Boliye boliye. Hello.
Executive: Ha sir ye main dekh raha tha ye jo ha jo product add hue the matlab 180 something product add hue the ye dekh raha hun sir 150 ho gaye aapne delete karwa diye kya?
Customer: Delete kiye wo faltu ke jo jo add kiye hue the wo delete kiye confuse jyada ho raha tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. To product koi aur add kar raha hai sir abhi?
Customer: Product meri team kar rahi hai bhaiya abhi to. Meri team kar rahi hai product add.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir dekh raha hun jo catalog ka score abhi tak hum apan dekh rahe the to uska thoda lagbhag tha 80 approx ha na. Abhi dikhai de raha hai 67 theek hai. Catalog ka score jo hota hai na wo 67 dikhai de raha hai na. To ispe kuch two videos ya fir ye sari cheeze hai jaise bahut sare product hai jiske score bahut kam hai theek hai. To usme wo dalwaiye theek hai na jisse score apna achcha rahe na pehle achcha khasa tha team ne ye bhi update diya hai mujhe. Aur review rating ka to abhi mujhe koi update mil nahi pa raha hai main daily kar raha hun isme theek hai. To iska mil nahi pa raha hai aur ye sari cheeze aap kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Na. Hmm. Theek hai. Hello. Ha. Hmm. Theek hai. Theek hai. Aur isko aaj jo bhi hoga sir aaj hum soch rahe hain iska jo bhi aur hamari taraf se aur ending wo cheeze bataiye. Jo hum kar denge ya fir aap se maine bola tha wo jaise uski detail diye the aise iski bhi detail de dijiye to ya fir baat kar lijiye usse review rating ka hai.
Executive: Wo phone phone pick nahi kar rahe plus message ka bhi reply nahi de raha party.
Customer: WhatsApp pe?
Executive: Ha. Hello. Ek bar WhatsApp screenshot de dena. WhatsApp ka dono ka screenshot de dena main fir se update kar dunga yahan se theek hai. Theek hai. To dekh lunga kya hai kya is vajah se is hamari team update milegi koi cheeze to kar dete hain aaj iska kara ke hume isko final karna hai sir jo bhi cheeze hain kafi din ho gaya ticket raise hue.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek hafta se upar ho gaya minimum teen din mein hona chahiye na. To aap mujhe wo de dijiye aaj evening tak iska hum jo bhi final update aata hai hum kar denge theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai. Theek hai. Aap de dijiye mujhe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says catalog score decreased.

- Customer not receiving review rating updates.

- Wants details on how to improve catalog.

- Review rating person not responding.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share WhatsApp screenshots.

- Executive assured to provide an update by evening.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share WhatsApp screenshots.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog score, review rating, whatsapp, update
